ID.AM-1.title: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried

ID.AM-2.title: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried

PR.AC-1.title: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked for authorized devices, users, and processes

PR.AC-4.title: Access permissions and authorizations are managed incorporating the principles of least privilege and separation of duties

PR.AC-5.title: Network integrity is protected (e.g., network segregation, network segmentation)

PR.DS-5.title: Protections against data leaks are implemented

PR.IP-1.title: A baseline configuration of IT systems is created and maintained

PR.MA-1.title: Maintenance and repair of organizational assets are performed and logged

PR.PT-3.title: The principle of least functionality is incorporated by configuring systems to provide only essential capabilities

DE.AE-1.title: A baseline of network operations and expected data flows for users and systems is established and managed

DE.CM-1.title: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

DE.CM-3.title: Personnel activity is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

DE.CM-7.title: Monitoring for unauthorized personnel, connections, devices, and software is performed

RS.AN-1.title: Notifications from detection systems are investigated

RC.RP-1.title: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident
